[StreetOneWayRoadIntersectionSolutions]
;
; transition straight road into straight street
RWSE=0x00020000,0x00000002,0x09aa0100,3,0
RNSS=0x02000000,0x00000200,0x09aa0100,0,0
RESW=0x00000002,0x00020000,0x09aa0100,1,0
RSSN=0x00000200,0x02000000,0x09aa0100,2,0
; transition straight road into end street
RESN=0x00000200,0x00020000,0x09aa0200,0,0
RSSE=0X00020000,0X02000000,0x09aa0200,1,0
RWSS=0X02000000,0X00000002,0x09aa0200,2,0
RNSW=0X00000002,0X00000200,0x09aa0200,3,0
RWSN=0X00000200,0X00000002,0x09aa0200,0,1
RNSE=0X00020000,0X00000200,0x09aa0200,3,1
RESS=0X02000000,0X00020000,0x09aa0200,2,1
RSSW=0X00000002,0X02000000,0x09aa0200,1,1
; transition straight road into corner street
RESWN=0X00000202,0X00020000,0x09aa0300,0,0
RSSNE=0X00020200,0X02000000,0x09aa0300,1,0
RWSES=0X02020000,0X00000002,0x09aa0300,2,0
RNSWS=0X02000002,0X00000200,0x09aa0300,3,0
RWSNE=0X00020200,0X00000002,0x09aa0300,0,1
RSSWN=0X00000202,0X02000000,0x09aa0300,1,1
RESSW=0X02000002,0X00020000,0x09aa0300,2,1
RNSES=0X02020000,0X00000200,0x09aa0300,3,1
; transition straight road into middle street
RESNS=0X02000200,0X00020000,0x09aa0400,0,0
RSSEW=0X00020002,0X02000000,0x09aa0400,1,0
RWSNS=0X02000200,0X00000002,0x09aa0400,2,0
RNSEW=0X00020002,0X00000200,0x09aa0400,3,0
; transition straight road into t-intersection street
RESSNW=0X02000202,0X00020000,0x09aa0500,0,0
RSSENW=0X00020202,0X02000000,0x09aa0500,1,0
RWSSEN=0X02020200,0X00000002,0x09aa0500,2,0
RNSSEW=0X02020002,0X00000200,0x09aa0500,3,0
; transition straight road into no exit street
RSS0=0X00000000,0x02000000,0x09aa0100,2,0
RES0=0X00000000,0X00020000,0x09aa0100,1,0
RNS0=0X00000000,0X00000200,0x09aa0100,0,0
RWS0=0X00000000,0X00000002,0x09aa0100,3,0
; transition corner road into straight street
RWNSS=0X02000000,0X00000202,0x09aa0700,0,0
RNESW=0X00000002,0X00020200,0x09aa0700,1,0
RESSN=0X00000200,0X02020000,0x09aa0700,2,0
RWSSE=0X00020000,0X02000002,0x09aa0700,3,0
RWNSE=0X00020000,0X00000202,0x09aa0700,1,1
RNESS=0X02000000,0X00020200,0x09aa0700,0,1
RESSW=0X00000002,0X02020000,0x09aa0700,3,1
RWSSN=0X00000200,0X02000002,0x09aa0700,2,1
; transition corner road into corner street
RWNSES=0X02020000,0X00000202,0x09aa0900,0,0
RNESSW=0X02000002,0X00020200,0x09aa0900,1,0
RESSWN=0X00000202,0X02020000,0x09aa0900,2,0
RWSSNE=0X00020200,0X02000002,0x09aa0900,3,0
; transition straight road into straight street (T)
RWESS=0X02000000,0X00020002,0x09aa0800,0,0
RNSSE=0X00020000,0X02000200,0x09aa0800,3,0
RNSSW=0X00000002,0X02000200,0x09aa0800,1,0
RWESN=0X00000200,0X00020002,0x09aa0800,2,0
; transition straight road into straight street (4-way)
RWESNS=0X02000200,0X00020002,0x09aa0A00,0,0
RNSSWE=0X00020002,0X02000200,0x09aa0A00,1,0
; transition t-intersection road into straight street
RWNESS=0X02000000,0X00020202,0x09aa0B00,0,0
RNESSW=0X00000002,0X02020200,0x09aa0B00,1,0
RWESSN=0X00000200,0X02020002,0x09aa0B00,2,0
RWNSSE=0X00020000,0X02000202,0x09aa0B00,3,0

;Added by Tarkus 20230522

;Diagonal Street Plugin Support
;Added by Tarkus 07092011
;updated 20230429
;transition diag onewayroad into diag street
;disabled - currently using Road IIDs
;TYPE1=0x00010000,0x03000000,0x5F502000,0,0
;TYPE2=0x01000000,0x00000003,0x5F502000,1,0
;TYPE3=0x00000001,0x00000300,0x5F502000,2,0
;TYPE4=0x00000100,0x00030000,0x5F502000,3,0
;TYPE5=0x00000003,0x01000000,0x5F502000,0,1
;TYPE6=0x03000000,0x00010000,0x5F502000,1,1
;TYPE7=0x00030000,0x00000100,0x5F502000,2,1
;TYPE8=0x00000300,0x00000001,0x5F502000,3,1

;
;
;
;--SAM Transitions--
; Ortho
;changed from 0x5E5C3400 to 0x5E5C0080 by Tarkus 15 April 2021
;changed to Street x OneWayRoad by Tarkus 17 April 2021 to fix wealth glitching
TYPE1=0x00020002,0x00010004,0x5E5C0080,0,0
TYPE2=0x02000200,0x01000400,0x5E5C0080,1,0
TYPE3=0x00020002,0x00040001,0x5E5C0080,2,0
TYPE4=0x02000200,0x04000100,0x5E5C0080,3,0

;
;FLEX-E-REW-2-(x)-Street
;
TYPE1=0x00020002,0x01000100,0x5C111000,0,0
TYPE2=0x02000200,0x00010001,0x5C111000,1,0
;
;FLEX-E-REW-3-(x)-Street
;
TYPE1=0x00020002,0x03000300,0x5C411000,0,0
TYPE2=0x02000200,0x00030003,0x5C411000,1,0
;
;
;--- PEDESTRIAN REVOLUTION MOD ---
;--- Draggable Classic Pedmalls --
;By:           Ulisse Wolf and Lucario Boricua
;Created on:   2023-jan-18
;Last updated: TBA
;
TYPE1=0x02020202,0x04040404,0x5C531100,0,0
TYPE1=0x02020202,0x01010101,0x5C532100,0,0
TYPE1=0x02020202,0x03030303,0x5C534100,0,0
